string-array.name: data_name
string-array.item: Python
JavaScript
Java
Ruby
Swift
Go
Rust
PHP
Kotlin
TypeScript
R

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Python is a versatile, high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It emphasizes code readability and allows programmers to express concepts in fewer lines of code.
JavaScript is a popular programming language used for front-end and back-end web development. It enables interactive elements on websites and allows developers to build dynamic web applications.
Java is a widely adopted object-oriented programming language known for its platform independence. It is used for building a variety of applications, from mobile apps to enterprise-level systems.

C++ is a powerful programming language widely used for system-level programming, game development, and performance-critical applications. It supports both procedural and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language known for its simplicity and productivity. It focuses on developer happiness and follows the principle of "Convention over Configuration.".
Swift is a modern, open-source programming language developed by Apple. It is designed for building applications for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. Swift aims for simplicity, safety, and performance.

Go, also known as Golang, is a statically typed programming language developed by Google. It offers high-performance execution, efficient concurrency, and built-in support for concurrent programming patterns.
Rust is a systems programming language focused on safety, speed, and concurrency. It provides memory safety and prevents many common programming errors, making it suitable for low-level development.

PHP is a widely used server-side scripting language designed for web development. It powers millions of websites and offers features for dynamically generating web pages and interacting with databases.
Kotlin is a statically typed programming language developed by JetBrains. It is interoperable with Java and can be used for building Android apps, server-side applications, and more.

TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript code. It adds static typing, enhanced tooling, and better maintainability to JavaScript projects, especially for larger codebases.

R is a programming language and environment specifically designed for statistical computing and graphics. It provides a wide range of statistical and graphical techniques and is extensively used in data analysis and research.
